articles.author: DeFi Pulse
articles.description:
.@coinbase CEO @brian_armstrong shares his thoughts on crypto regulation…
Brian Armstrong: 1/ I often get asked: “What does regulatory clarity actually look like for crypto?” So I outlined a realistic blueprint for this that regulates centralized actors, while preserving decentralized innovation.
 https://www.coinbase.com/blog/regulating-crypto-how-we-move-forward-as-an-industry-from-here

articles.author: DeFi Pulse
articles.description:
Re On FTX's Risk Management system: 
Absolutely false. There was no sophistication. There was an absence of risk management.
articles.title: Re On FTX's Risk Management system: Absolutely false. There was no sophistication. There was an absence of risk management.

articles.author: DeFi Pulse
articles.description:
Re John Ray on being worse than Enron:
There is no record-keeping whatsoever. Employees would communicate invoices and expenses on Slack. They use Quickbooks. A multi-billion dollar company. There is no independent board. That is highly unusual.

Re On the loans givens to SBF:
